lead_paragraph: For a format that encourages big hits to maximise entertainment value, it was perhaps fitting that the World Twenty20 final culminated with Carlos Brathwaite blasting four sixes in a row to win it for West Indies.

headline.print_headline: Brathwaite Blasts Provide Apt Climax to Indian Stunner
headline.main: Brathwaite Blasts Provide Apt Climax to Indian Stunner

snippet: For a format that encourages big hits to maximise entertainment value, it was perhaps fitting that the World Twenty20 final culminated with Carlos Brathwaite blasting four sixes in a row to win it for West Indies....
